code: @Override @Before public void setUp() throws Exception {     port = AvailablePortFinder.getNextAvailable(25500).     super.setUp().     Thread.sleep(200). }

@Override protected CamelContext createCamelContext() throws Exception {     CamelContext context = super.createCamelContext().     SparkComponent spark = context.getComponent("spark-rest", SparkComponent.class).     spark.setPort(port).     return context. }
